TopicTitle: SSTO Space plane to EVE 22.5 tons

Articles.Content: I built a SSTO to EVE only 22.5 tons, is it good, had 2200 delta- V at orbit? It seemde pretty awesome at the time, or is it done a lot?
Can we see some pics of it? Thats pretty small for a interplanetary SSTO, good job
There's no such thing as "done alot" when returning from Eve, because it will be surely an OVERKILL, no matter how small as possible it can be.
